Add color and plot theme

add_theme.Rd

Add color and plot theme

Usage

add_theme(
  plot,
  aesthetic = c("color", "fill"),
  discrete = TRUE,
  palette = c("1", "2"),
  ...
)

Arguments

plot

A ggplot object

aesthetic

One of "color" or "fill" indicating which aesthetic to add color to

discrete

Logical indicating whether to use the discrete or continuous color/fill scale

palette

One of 1 or 2 indicating which default color palette to use

...

Additional arguments to pass to the color/fill scale functions

Value

A ggplot object with color/plot theme added
